input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
No description available.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Surf Stripe Sunwashed Pocket T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Performance Long-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Crew Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Palm Springs Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty | SUMMER RED CLASSIC LOCATION TSHIRT | Size: L'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Shorelite Short-Sleeve Tech T-Shirt'
  - Name='Women's Faherty Cloud Varsity Cotton & Modal T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium Weight Short-Sleeve Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Rec Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Pocket T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Human Crew Neck'
  - Name='PACT Men's Organic Field Midweight Slub Polo'
  - Name='Kotn Men's French Terry Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Allbirds Soft Merino Long Sleeve Tee'
  - Name='Outerknown Sojourn Men's Short Sleeve Tee'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Hemp T-Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Jack Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Organic Cotton Tee'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's '73 Skyline Organic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's P-6 Mission Organic T-Shirt'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Signature Sea Change Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Hiking Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Hawthorne Short Sleeve Organic Cotton Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are men's short-sleeve cotton T-shirts with pocket details, likely similar in silhouette and function, though the Faherty may not specify organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Surf Stripe Sunwashed Pocket T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above, a men's short-sleeve cotton T-shirt with pocket and stripe pattern differences; comparable core style and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Performance Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long-sleeve performance tee differs in sleeve length and material focus, less similar to an organic cotton short-sleeve tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Sunwashed Crew Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic crew neck short-sleeve tee likely cotton but unclear if organic; similar silhouette but somewhat uncertain material share.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Palm Springs Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard short-sleeve men's tee, likely cotton, close to shop tee structure though organic content not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty | SUMMER RED CLASSIC LOCATION TSHIRT | Size: L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic short-sleeve T-shirt form, probable cotton, but lack of organic specification and detail reduces score slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Shorelite Short-Sleeve Tech T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tech T-shirt implies synthetic or performance fabric, differing from organic cotton material focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Faherty Cloud Varsity Cotton & Modal T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton blend T-shirt with modal fabric; women's cut also differs, so moderately relevant but not closely similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Premium Weight Short-Sleeve Polo T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Polo style differs from crew neck tee silhouette; material weight premium cotton but usually not organic; differing formality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Rec Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's crew neck short-sleeve T-shirt with focus on quality fabric, likely organic cotton; very close in silhouette and likely materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Pocket T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's heavyweight pocket T-shirt similar to organic shop tee in construction and features; organic content probable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Essential Organic Polo T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton is shared, but polo style differs in collar and silhouette from organic cotton shop tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Human Crew Neck
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck tee probably organic cotton and simple design, similar to shop tee, but details less explicit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PACT Men's Organic Field Midweight Slub Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton polo shirt differs in silhouette from crew neck tee but shares organic material aspect.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kotn Men's French Terry Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: French terry sweatshirt differs drastically in silhouette and purpose from short-sleeve tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Allbirds Soft Merino Long Sleeve Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve and merino wool fabric differ in material and styling from organic cotton short sleeve tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Sojourn Men's Short Sleeve Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's short sleeve tee from a sustainable brand fits closely in silhouette, construction, and intended use to an organic cotton shop tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Hemp T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with organic cotton hemp fabric, T-shirt style very close to reference organic cotton shop tee; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Jack Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton but shirt style differs from tee; different silhouette reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Organic Cotton Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Menâ€™s organic cotton T-shirt is highly relevant in silhouette, construction, and fabric type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Patagonia Men's '73 Skyline Organic T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton menâ€™s T-shirt, similar crew neck silhouette and style, highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic organic cotton T-shirt with similar construction and silhouette, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Signature Sea Change Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Menâ€™s crew neck tee likely organic cotton or sustainable fabric with similar style and use.
